feature.label: NetzDatenStrom BDA Test Feature
feature.description: This feature bundles all plug-ins that are needed for the use cases of the module named "big data archive (BDA)" of the research project NetzDatenStrom (NDS). (1) read CIM/XML and topology data (JSON or XML), (2) check plausibility of data with historical data, (3) check plausibility of data with weather data, and (4) send data enriched with plausibility values as CIM/XML.
